enriched_items.title: AI-Powered Task Prioritization
enriched_items.description: Develop an intelligent system that automatically prioritizes user tasks based on deadlines, importance, and user habits to maximize productivity and reduce stress.
enriched_items.business_value: Increase user productivity and satisfaction by ensuring users focus on the most important tasks first.
acceptance_criteria: Acceptance criteria to be defined

enriched_items.title: Smart Scheduling & Personalization
enriched_items.description: Implement a smart scheduling engine that suggests optimal working times and adapts to user routines, enabling personalized time management for work and study.
enriched_items.business_value: Empower users to optimize their schedules and achieve personal goals efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: Acceptance criteria to be defined

enriched_items.title: Task Breakdown & Timeline Visualization
enriched_items.description: Enable users to break down large tasks into manageable subtasks with clear timelines, improving organization and reducing overwhelm.
enriched_items.business_value: Help users manage complex tasks more effectively and reduce stress through better planning.
acceptance_criteria: Acceptance criteria to be defined

enriched_items.title: Focus Mode & Productivity Tracking
enriched_items.description: Provide a distraction-free focus mode with Pomodoro timer and productivity analytics to help users maintain concentration and track their progress.
enriched_items.business_value: Support users in achieving deep work and monitoring their productivity improvements.
acceptance_criteria: Acceptance criteria to be defined

enriched_items.title: Secure Authentication & User Data Protection
enriched_items.description: Build a secure authentication system with two-factor authentication and robust data encryption to protect user information and ensure privacy.
enriched_items.business_value: Ensure user trust and compliance by safeguarding sensitive data and access.
acceptance_criteria: Acceptance criteria to be defined

enriched_items.title: As a user, I want the system to prioritize my tasks automatically so that I can focus on the most important ones first
enriched_items.description: Enable automatic task prioritization based on deadlines, importance, and user habits.
enriched_items.business_value: Reduce user stress and improve productivity by focusing attention on critical tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Given user has multiple tasks, When system analyzes deadlines and importance, Then tasks are sorted by priority
Given user updates a task, When task details change, Then priority list is updated in real-time
Given user views task list, When priority is set, Then highest priority tasks appear at the top

enriched_items.title: As a user, I want the system to suggest optimal working times so that I can maximize my productivity
enriched_items.description: Provide personalized time suggestions based on user schedule and habits.
enriched_items.business_value: Help users optimize their work/study hours for better results and satisfaction.
acceptance_criteria: Given user has a set schedule, When system analyzes habits, Then optimal time slots are suggested
Given user receives a suggestion, When user accepts or modifies it, Then schedule is updated accordingly
Given user changes routine, When habits are updated, Then new suggestions are generated

enriched_items.title: As a user, I want the system to break down large tasks into subtasks so that I can manage them more effectively
enriched_items.description: Allow users to split complex tasks into smaller, actionable items with clear timelines.
enriched_items.business_value: Enable users to organize and complete complex tasks with less stress.
acceptance_criteria: Given user creates a large task, When system analyzes the task, Then subtasks are generated automatically
Given user views a task, When subtasks exist, Then timeline for each subtask is displayed
Given user edits subtasks, When changes are made, Then updates are reflected in the timeline

enriched_items.title: As a user, I want a focus mode with a Pomodoro timer so that I can work without distractions
enriched_items.description: Provide a dedicated focus mode with Pomodoro timer and notification blocking.
enriched_items.business_value: Help users maintain concentration and track productivity improvements.
acceptance_criteria: Given user activates focus mode, When timer starts, Then notifications are blocked
Given user completes a Pomodoro session, When timer ends, Then productivity stats are updated
Given user exits focus mode, When session ends, Then notifications are restored

enriched_items.title: As a user, I want to login securely with two-factor authentication so that my account and data are protected
enriched_items.description: Implement secure login with password and two-factor authentication for user safety.
enriched_items.business_value: Protect user accounts and sensitive data from unauthorized access.
acceptance_criteria: Given user enters valid credentials, When two-factor code is provided, Then user is logged in
Given user enters invalid credentials or code, When login is attempted, Then error message is displayed
Given user is logged in, When session expires, Then user is prompted to re-authenticate

enriched_items.title: Integrate with Google Calendar and Outlook
enriched_items.description: Develop integration layer to sync user schedules with Google Calendar and Outlook APIs.
acceptance_criteria: Given user connects calendar, When integration is successful, Then events are synced
Given user updates schedule, When changes are made, Then external calendars are updated

enriched_items.title: Implement user data encryption
enriched_items.description: Set up encryption for user data at rest and in transit using industry standards.
acceptance_criteria: Given user data is stored, When encryption is applied, Then data is unreadable without keys
Given data is transmitted, When encryption is active, Then data is secure during transfer
